snippet.title: Allogloom Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist On:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2644100/Allogloom/


Is something strange going on in the town of Gruesome Grove? The sacred moths are disappearing, but Nora is not allowed to talk about it. Is the new Moth Minder more nervous than usual? No! He’s just a worry wart Granny says.

Nora’s mother Lily is still missing, it’s not unusual to disappear in a village like Gruesome Grove. However, a body is always found, well, most of it. But everything is normal or at least everyone pretends it is.

In this point & click adventure join Nora on her journey of weird and wonderful discovery. The world she's known is about to be changed forever. She’s going to have to break the rules to save everyone she loves.

Features:

- Charming characters human, monster and animal alike.
- Unique hand-drawn 2D art style.
- Combine items and negotiate with characters to solve Interesting puzzles.
- Intriguing story with a dark style of humour.
- Made by a solo developer: Illustration, game design and animation.
- Original soundtrack created by a talented friend!
